meta.name: Fetch OpenAI File
meta.description: Generates a readable stream for a file stored in OpenAI Storage. Return this stream using a 'Return' node to receive it through an API endpoint (to download the file, write it to the file system, etc.)

meta.name: OpenAI Assistant (Stream Response)
meta.description: Add different script nodes and let the AI Assistant automatically choose which to execute based on the input. The node returns a streamed text response (meant to be returned back to the client) and the thread ID (to track the conversation). Built to work with OpenAI Assistants API.

meta.name: OpenAI Assistant
meta.description: Add different script nodes and let the AI Assistant automatically choose which to execute based on the input. Built to work with OpenAI Assistants API V2.
Extract structured data from any web page.
meta.name: LLM Extract URL
LLM Extract
meta.description: Extract structured data from any text input.
Generate embeddings for a given content using OpenAI text-embedding-ada-002 model
meta.name: Generate Embeddings

meta.description: Generates text based on a given user and system prompt and always returns a JSON object using the OpenAI GPT (Turbo) APIs.
meta.name: JSON Generator
Text Generator
meta.description: Generates text based on a given user and system prompt using the OpenAI GPT API

meta.description: Find the nearest neighbors for a given search query using OpenAI embeddings
meta.name: Neighbor Search
Stream Response
meta.description:
Send a chat message to OpenAI and stream the response back to the client.

**Important**: this node does not support Workflow/Node Testing.

**Note**: add a blank return node at the end to prevent printing `OK` in the response.
Converts text to speech using OpenAI API and returns audio in Base64.
meta.name: Text to Speech

meta.description: Use GPT-4 Vision to ask questions about images.
meta.name: GPT-4 Vision

meta.description: Convert audio/speech to text using OpenAI's Whisper API.
meta.name: Whisper Speech To Text
